CustomField.formula: IF( ISNULL( Patient_Birth_Date__c), '', IF( FLOOR((TODAY()- Patient_Birth_Date__c+1)/365.2425) < 18, IMAGE("/resource/MINOR"," ") + ' ' + TEXT(FLOOR((TODAY()- Patient_Birth_Date__c+1)/365.2425)), TEXT(FLOOR((TODAY()- Patient_Birth_Date__c+1)/365.2425)) ) )
CustomField.label: Patient Age
